name: BluetoothRemoteGATTServer.getPrimaryServices

content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The BluetoothRemoteGATTServer.getPrimaryServices() method returns a promise to a list of primary BluetoothGATTService objects offered by the bluetooth devicefor a specified BluetoothServiceUUID.
